sqlMap.statement: SELECT A.adptrCd AS "adptrCd", CAST( A.adptrCdSeq AS CHAR) AS "adptrCdSeq", A.intfId AS "intfId", A.layoutKey AS "layoutKey" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIEA05 A WHERE layoutKey = #layoutKey# order by A.adptrCd,A.adptrCdSeq

SELECT A.adptrCd AS "adptrCd", CAST( A.adptrCdSeq AS CHAR) AS "adptrCdSeq", A.intfId AS "intfId", A.layoutKey AS "layoutKey" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIEA03 A WHERE layoutKey = #layoutKey# order by A.adptrCd,A.adptrCdSeq

INSERT INTO $schemaId$.TSEAIES06( adptrCd, adptrCdSeq, layoutSeq, intfId, orderSeq, colSize, colDepth, colDesc, colDescEng, colType, colKind ) VALUES (#adptrCd#, CAST(#adptrCdSeq# AS UNSIGNED), IFNULL((SELECT MAX(layoutSeq)+1 FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIES06 WHERE adptrCd=#adptrCd# AND adptrCdSeq=#adptrCdSeq# ),1), #intfId#, CAST(IFNULL(#orderSeq#,'0') AS UNSIGNED), #colSize#, #colDepth#, #colDesc#, #colDescEng#, #colType#, #colKind# )

DELETE FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIES06 WHERE adptrCd = #adptrCd# AND adptrCdSeq = CAST(#adptrCdSeq# AS UNSIGNED)
AND layoutSeq = TO_NUMBER(#layoutSeq#)

INSERT INTO $schemaId$.TSEAIES08 ( logPrcssSeqno, Seqno, ServiceName ,Command,LoutName,RecvData,RecvAmndHMS,PrcssRslt, PrcssRsltCmnt ) VALUES ( #logPrcssSeqno#, #Seqno#, #ServiceName# ,#Command#,#LoutName#,#RecvData#,#RecvAmndHMS#,#PrcssRslt#, #PrcssRsltCmnt# )
